updates.update_userinfo: Lost Empires! A New Game by the creators of Terrors of London!
updates.update_content:
Hello backers!
We wanted to thank you all for your continued support of Terrors of London. Your photos and tags on our social media mean so much to us and we really can’t thank you all enough!   We wanted to touch base with you all as we are thrilled to say that our next Kickstarter campaign is by the designers of Terrors themselves, Ryan and Brad Pye, and is coming to Kickstarter on April 27th!

Hey backers, we've got exciting news to share! 
2021 is a year of immense growth for Kolossal Games. We are more determined than ever to grow our community with diverse and inclusive players and creators. This new pledge from us has us creating new ways to interact with our community and in this mind meld we've discovered the value of Discord and with that a brand new Ambassador program!

Dear backers,
#Kolossal 2020
After our last few campaigns, we thought it was the time for our very first report to stakeholders! It is meant for you: backers, retail partners, and friends in gaming.
Through our projects, we learned, but most importantly, we listened to you, even when we did not always reply right away. We heard criticism and feedback, even when it was harsh.

Hi everyone,
We are really happy we were able to bring Terrors of London to life and to see so much positive feedback from you on this game.
This Kickstarter campaign has come to an end. This is our last post, we will not be posting any new updates here or monitoring the comments page. You can always reach out to us by opening a ticket through our Customer Care Team:   . If you have questions or concerns with any issues, please let us know and we will handle each request on a case-by-case basis. Having recently closed and answered a lot of tickets from previous Kickstarter campaigns we are ready to respond to yours in 3 working days.

Hello, all!
Terrors of London has reached doorsteps around the world! There are a few remaining Canadian backers who are awaiting their French language copies and we assure those backers that their games will arrive before the end of the month! Replacement cards are on their way as well. Things are moving forward!
As you get to know the game and start to play it more and more, we hope that you'll reach out and let us know what you think! What are your favorite combos? Who is the most powerful Overlord? We want to know what you think.

Dear Terrors of London backers,
We're reaching out to share some awesome news!
The new cards have been printed at our manufacturing center and they have arrived at our fulfillment centers in the US and in the EU. This means we will begin sending out replacement cards today!

updates.update_userinfo: Update on Terrors of London Cards
updates.update_content:
Dear Terrors of London backers,
We have received confirmation from the factory that they've unfortunately made a mistake with the production of some cards.  Our specs clearly state that the requested material is 300GSM as promised during the campaign. But it appears that a mistake was made during the material changeover in the machines at the factory, affecting less than 10% of the games. The German and French copies were not affected.

We are reaching out to inform everyone of two issues faced with the production process ofTerrors of London.
We have received confirmation from the factory that they've unfortunately made a mistake with the production of some cards. After checking our specs, the requested material is in fact 300GSM as promised. The sample that the Kolossal Team received and approved was correct. But it appears that a mistake was made and material was changed during material changeover in the machines at the factory, affecting some of the games produced. We have already looked into the possibility of reprinting the cards, but this would be a time-consuming process and we would rather address this issue immediately. Because we pride ourselves on making components of the highest quality, we would like to rectify this situation by offering card sleeves. This would reinforce the sturdiness of the cards as well as lengthen their playing life. You can reach out to us directly through our and we will ship a set of sleeves directly to you.

Hello Terrors of London Backers!
Games are arriving at backers' doorsteps around the world! We are very excited to get this game into your hands.
For those of you who have not received your game by July 26th, we encourage you to reach out to our Customer Care Center so that we can track down your shipment and provide you with detailed information on when to expect your game.

Hello Terrors of London Backers!
We wanted to do a quick follow-up to our June 20th update to address a mistake, and how we’re going to fix it!
Terrors of London has completed printing in all languages. Copies are being delivered to supporters in North America, Europe, Australia and Asian. All good stuff!

campaign.story:
This was the Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest: Back to the Dungeon! Our thanks to all the Backers who supported us in this Quest!

Use this link to access the Pledge Manager for Backer Rewards and Late Pledges! 
If you have any questions or comments please email kickstarter@alderac.com.
Thunderstone designed by Mike Elliott is a deckbuilding game of heroic adventure. We successfully Kickstarted Thunderstone Quest in the spring of 2017 and delivered it in the spring of 2018. This Kickstarter features Barricades Mode designed by Bryan Reese - rules and components for Solo & CoOp play, plus Quest 6: What Lies Beneath. 
You have four options to back this Kickstarter - Champion which consists of the Champion Reward from the 1st Kickstarter (but no new content), To The Barricades! which consists of just the new content in this campaign, Champion + Barricades! which combines both into one Reward, and Your Inventory is Full! which includes the Champion Reward, To the Barricades, 6 packs of Premium Sleeves, the Epic Thunderstone Add-on for Champion, and the Neoprene Mat.
Note for Expedited Backers: You can not drop your Expedited Pledge, switch to Your Inventory Is Full! and still get your Champion Expedited. If you have an Expedited Reward, don't change it. In the Pledge Manager there will be a special Add-on option just for you that will allow you to get all the contents of Your Inventory is Full! at the same price as the Reward listed in this Kickstarter, and keep your Expedited Status. We will ensure that every Expedited Backer who wants this Add-on will be able to get it regardless of the quantity ordered by other backers.

If you drop your Expedited Reward, we can't re-instate it. So don't drop it unless you really, really don't want your Champion Expedited.

Note for All other Backers (including $1 Backers): You will be able to upgrade your Reward in the Pledge Manager to Your Inventory Is Full! at the same price listed in this Kickstarter. QUANTITIES MAY BE LIMITED, so to guarantee that you get this Reward, select it now!
All Quests, including Quest 6: What Lies Beneath, and the Stretch Goals from this campaign, can be played in either Barricades Mode or normal Competitive Mode.
Follow the story of our Stretch Goals through Kickstarter Updates!
The Backers of this campaign successfully unlocked all the contents of Quest 7: Frostbite(*)! Quest 7 will join Quest 6: What Lies Beneath in the To The Barricades! portion of the Rewards for this Kickstarter.
The Premium To the Barricades Box!
(This packaging is for illustration purposes only. Actual box will differ in graphics and dimensions.)
With the completion of this Kickstarter the Thunderstone Quest product line will be quite large. 7 Quests, support for 6 players, and all the components of Barricades Mode, 8 plastic figures, plus Epic Thunderstone support and the Neoprene Mat.
Players who sleeve their cards will have filled the original Champions box. Therefore the To the Barricades box is being engineered to complement the Champion box.
In addition, we’re designing a plastic vac-formed tray that you can use to organize the various tokens and chits as you play. You can store those things in the tray in the box, and when it’s time to play you can remove the tray and put it on the table! The tray will be designed to accommodate all the various tokens & chits included in Champion + Barricades and a little bit of future proofing as well!
Currently we envision a box with the same dimensions as the Champion box. The two boxes will be graphically designed to compliment each other on your shelf.
We believe that when you sleeve all cards including Epic the two boxes together will have room for one or two additional Quests beyond Quest 7, although the storage of the Neoprene Playmat Add-on will affect how many cards can be stored in the boxes.
We expect to provide a suggested setup for managing all the cards and components across the two boxes when To the Barricades is delivered. Some people will prefer to organize their cards alphabetically by type. Others will organize them by Quest. We will have suggested setups for both.
The To the Barricades! Box will be Kickstarter Exclusive!
All unlocked Stretch Goals are included in To the Barricades! and Champion + Barricades! and Your Inventory Is Full!, but are not included in the Champion reward.
The Champion, Champion + Barricades! and Your Inventory is Full! rewards will include all the Kickstarter Exclusive Content from the 1st Kickstarter.
Kickstarter Exclusive content ("KSE") are game components and accessories that are available only to backers of AEG Kickstarters. Kickstarter Exclusive Content may be released in an alternate form more widely in the future (different art, different card titles, etc.).
Thunderstone is one of the most successful games AEG has ever published. The Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest and delivery of those rewards to our backers has enabled us to continue to develop the game and expand its scope. 
The major innovation for Thunderstone Quest is ... Quests! Each Quest consists of a selection of dungeon tiles and monster cards that create an engaging storyline. Each Quest includes rules for selecting Village and Dungeon cards to create a variety of Adventures. After you've mastered each Quest you use random setups of Quest cards to create new Dungeons and Villages - build your own Quests and Adventures!
The Champion Reward
Includes:
Really Big Box that holds all Champion content (even sleeved!)
5 Quests (each Quest includes approximately 245 cards and 6 Dungeon Tiles [except Ripples in Time which includes 4])
Over 130 base game cards (starting cards, quest cards, treasure cards, wound cards, key cards, randomizers & dividers)
Wilderness tile
Village game board
6 plastic Champion figures
140 wood tokens
5 six-sided dice
Rule book
Quest book
Kickstarter exclusives & extras including The Yellow Knight card & meeple (googly eyes not included)
Barricades Mode
One of the most requested features from the community was the ability to play the game solo or in a co-operative game. Our team has developed an extension to Thunderstone Quest called Barricades Mode to make that possible.
Includes:
6 Guardian Boards
[ In ongoing playtesting, Guardian Key cards were removed ]
20 damage chits
1 Damage chit bag
2 Marketplace overlay boards
8 Prestige Class boards
30 Prestige tokens
20 Guardian Dice (D12)
1 Threat Level wooden token
5 Barricade tokens
2 Additional Player Packs (all components required for adding a 5th and 6th player to both Competitive Mode and Barricades Mode)
Quest 6: What Lies Beneath
We area also presenting Quest 6: What Lies Beneath in this campaign. What Lies Beneath is designed to work with Barricades Mode to create a seamless storytelling experience. What Lies Beneath can be played in normal competitive mode too. All of the other Quests will be compatible with Barricades Mode.
Includes:
Approximately 245 cards
6 Dungeon tiles
Rulebook
Epic Thunderstone support cards
Full color storage box (will also hold components from Barricades Mode)
Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon is on Kickstarter so that we can bring all our current backers the content they've asked for quickly, and to create an opportunity for new backers to join the adventure and get access to all the Kickstarter Exclusive content from the first campaign.
The Stretch Goals in this campaign will be included in the To The Barricades! reward, and the Champion + Barricades!, and the Your Inventory Is Full! reward, but not the Champion reward.

(*) Quest 7: Frostbite is a working title and is subject to change.
The rules for Thunderstone Quest are available for download on the Thunderstone page at alderac.com. 
Update 15AUG:  We have produced a special Print & Play package for Barricades Mode that you can download and assemble at home. This is version 2.2 of the Barricades Mode system! If you own Thunderstone Quest, you'll be able to play Barricades Mode with this Print & Play!
Thunderstone Quest is a deckbuilding game where 2-4 players (or 1-6 players in Barricades Mode) compete to see who can score the most victory points when the game ends. In deckbuilding games your objective is to try to assemble the best possible deck to achieve the play strategy you prefer based on the options that are assembled for each game, and the random challenges you'll need to overcome.
Each player's deck represents a party of stalwart adventurers who will face and defeat the challenges of the Dungeon and will return to the Village to recover and re-equip.
On each turn you use your deck to generate a hand of cards, and you take actions based on the cards you drew. Sometimes you'll be in the Village buying new cards and using your resources. Sometimes you'll be in the Dungeon fighting monsters. And sometimes you'll do a little bit of both!
This new version of Thunderstone enhances the Dungeon mechanic introduced in classic Thunderstone. In Thunderstone Quest you'll be playing an Adventure which is comprised of a set of Dungeon tiles and a selection of monsters, treasures, and challenges that are themed to that Dungeon. You'll get the sense of a dramatic campaign as you grow stronger and finally confront the Guardian.
Depending on which cards you buy and which adversaries you defeat you will earn victory points. After the Guardian encounter is over, the player with the most victory points is the winner!
The competitive mode is designed for 2 to 4 people to play and it takes about 90 minutes to complete an Adventure. Barricades mode is designed for 1 to 6 people to play and will also take about 90 minutes to complete an Adventure.
Thunderstone Quest uses a lot of the rules from previous versions of Thunderstone but the cards from previous versions are not compatible.
The heroes must travel through time and into the arctic waste in search of a legendary artifact of great power. Follow along as their story unfolds with each new Stretch Goal!
Epic Thunderstone: 
Our 1st Add-On is a special set of over 200 cards that supports Epic-style play of Thunderstone Quest for the Champion and Champion + Barricades! Reward. If you backed the first Kickstarter and are backing this Kickstarter at the To the Barricades! level you can also order this Add-on.
The purpose of this Add-On is purely convenience. There is no content in the Epic Add-On that isn't already in the Champion Reward.
All new content (including Stretch Goals) in this campaign will be Epic-compatible and will have Epic support automatically included.
There are extensive answers about Epic Thunderstone and this Add-On in the FAQ. Please check to see if your question has already been answered before asking in the Comment thread.
Epic Thunderstone is a popular way to play created by players of Classic Thunderstone. In Epic Thunderstone you build a Village and a Dungeon draw pile using one of each of all your cards instead of playing with a pre-selected tableau. It's a way to see and use more of your card collection. Every game will be different.
Rules for Epic Thunderstone are included in the main rulebook.
This Add-On is a pre-built Epic Thunderstone deck ready for play. You won't have to subtract cards from your main play set to play Epic Thunderstone.
You'll need a full copy of Thunderstone Quest to play the Epic variant since there are cards, boards, tokens and other resources in the main game that are required to play Epic Thunderstone.
Neoprene Playmat
This is one of the most requested upgrades from the community and we're proud to announce that we'll be able to make Neoprene Playmats available as a part of this Kickstarter!
We've also heard the suggestions that the size of the Village board is larger than some groups prefer, and this Playmat also addresses that concern.
The Playmat will be sized so that it can fit within the To the Barricades box for this Kickstarter, rolled up. The length will be between 295 and 300 mm. The width is still undetermined; the graphics team will be redesigning the Village layout to accommodate the new size after the Kickstarter but the total will be smaller than the current Village board.
Premium Sleeves
Our 2nd Add-On are packs of Premium Sleeves. These Sleeves use the same plastic we used in the Mystic Vale sleeves.
The Sleeves are 66x91mm, 0.09mm thick (0.09mm = 90µ (or "microns" = 3.54 "mils")) and will fit Thunderstone Quest cards and cards that are the same size as Magic: The Gathering cards.
We are providing them in packs of 500 Sleeves for $15 per pack. You can order as many packs as you wish.
To sleeve every playable card in the Champion Reward and the Epic Add-On you would need 4 packs (2,000 Sleeves).
You will need 1 more pack to sleeve the new content in To the Barricades! and Champion + Barricades!.
The Champion box holds all the Champion content, plus the Epic Add-on cards sleeved. You will need to store future Quests (including Quest 6: What Lies Beneath and the stretch goals from this campaign) in their own boxes if you wish to sleeve them.
Adventurer Catch-Up Kit
Our third Add-on is a way for people who purchased the Adventurer Reward in the first Kickstarter to get the Quests that they did not purchase in the first campaign. It consists of Quest 3: Risen from the Mire, and Quest 4: At the Foundations of the World. The Quests will be delivered in a plain white tuckbox, not the retail packaging. You must back the campaign at the To The Barricades! pledge level to order this Add-on (all this content is included in the Champion and Champion + Barricades! rewards.)
We have configured our logistics system to provide the lowest average cost for all our Backers while working with trusted partners for delivery of your Rewards.
If you selected the Champion+Barricades (Expedited US Only) reward you will receive your Champion box in an expedited early shipment soon after the campaign ends. We have 1,000 units of Champion in our warehouse in the US so we will be able to send the Champion part of your Reward on an expedited timeline. We believe we can have them delivered 6 to 8 weeks after the close of the campaign. You will need to log in to your order in the Pledge Manager and provide your delivery information immediately after the campaign ends to ensure you get the fastest possible delivery.
Because this inventory is already in the United States the cost, customs issues, and complexity of shipping to non-US addresses prohibit us from delivering the expedited portion of the Reward outside the United States.
The cost to ship the Champion Reward for expedited delivery will be borne by AEG. Backers at this level will pay for shipping & handling for the rest of the Reward normally based on weight, and the rest of the Reward will ship at the same time as fulfillment of all other Reward content for this Kickstarter in 2019.

If you have any questions please email kickstarter@alderac.com.
We will be charging shipping after the Kickstarter concludes based on the actual costs incurred to ship from the closest distribution center to your delivery address. You will pay for shipping & handling in our Pledge Manager. Links to the Pledge Manager will be sent shortly after the Kickstarter campaign ends. 
Shipping costs vary widely based on where you will receive your reward.
We will ship your Rewards at our cost to our international distribution centers. Based on your delivery address we will either ship to you from our Depot in the EU, in China, in Australia or from the USA (Canada and the rest of the world).
The following chart are estimates for shipping Champion + Barricades! (including Stretch Goals) without Add-Ons. Orders that include Add-Ons will be more expensive. 
We are currently estimating the weight of Champion + Barricades! at 23lbs/12kg.
USA:$23 
CANADA: $40 
EUROPE: $27 to Germany. $39 to EU + Norway, Switzerland & Lichtenstein 
LATIN AMERICA: $80 to most countries. 
ASIA: $33 to China and Hong Kong. $62 to most other countries. 
OCEANIA: $45 to Australia. $75 to New Zealand. 
Rest of World: $80
The following chart are estimates for shipping To The Barricades! (including Stretch Goals) without Add-Ons. Orders that include Add-Ons will be more expensive.
We are currently estimating the weight of To The Barricades! at 10lbs/5kg.
USA:$15 
CANADA: $25 
EUROPE: $17 to Germany. $27 to EU + Norway, Switzerland & Lichtenstein 
LATIN AMERICA: $57 to most countries. 
ASIA: $20 to China and Hong Kong. $37 to most other countries. 
OCEANIA: $29 to Australia. $39 to New Zealand. 
Rest of World: $57
Keep in mind these are just estimates, and costs may rise based on weight increases from unlocked stretch goals and Add-Ons.
All cost estimates are in US Dollars.
We expect to use Aetherworks for fulfillment in Australia for this campaign. That is subject to change due to the advance nature of this campaign but Aetherworks is our currently preferred provider and our estimates for shipping to Australia and New Zealand reflect their cost structure.
Unfortunately, different import laws and customs from some specific countries have made it impossible for AEG to ship games to them.
WE DO NOT SHIP TO: Brazil, Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and Afghanistan.
Alderac Entertainment Group is committed to supporting brick & mortar retail game stores. Our Kick It Here program is designed to let stores participate in the fun and excitement of a Kickstarter campaign. 
To participate in the Kick It Here program for Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon please email kickstarter@alderac.com with the name of your store, the URL of your store's website, and your store's physical address. We will reply with details about the Kick It Here Promotion.
Participating retailers agree not to sell Thunderstone Quest product received through this promotion on the internet.
Kick It Here orders are available to any brick & mortar store anywhere we ship the Kickstarter Rewards to - stores will pay actual Shipping & Handling for delivery just like regular backers.
AEG would like to thank the following experts who helped make this campaign possible: 
Mike Elliott, Original Design & Development of Thunderstone
Mike Elliott, Bryan Reese & Mark Wootton, Design & Development of Thunderstone Quest
Matt Paquette, Kickstarter Campaign Page graphics
Benjamin Sheedy, voice work for the main campaign video
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At the end of the campaign we will cancel and refund any pledge of less than $50. To remain a Backer in good standing, please select a Reward of $50 or more.

All images used in this Kickstarter are subject to change and may represent unfinished or non-final art or design. All card counts are approximate and are subject to change. All card and component names are subject to change. All packaging is subject to change and is not finalized. Rules are subject to change.

Alderac Entertainment Group has been in the publishing business for more than 20 years. We are experienced at producing games in China and distributing them worldwide. Nonetheless there are always risks associated with manufacturing and logistics.

These problems can delay or otherwise impact our ability to meet our commitments to our backers.

These issues include (but are not limited to):

* Production delays 
* Shipping delays 
* Customs delays

The estimated delivery date is April 2019, but keep in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

We've done our best to minimize this as much as possible, and we are always happy to refund pledges if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered at all.

REFUND POLICY

Before the Rewards are shipped we offer no questions asked refunds. Once we have shipped your Reward our refund policy will depend on the circumstances and will be at our discretion.

At your request we can give you a full refund within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that we will subtract Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from Kickstarter after 14 days). Those fees usually equal 8% of the total pledge.

Refunds will be processed through Kickstarter and will be applied to whatever payment method you provided to Kickstarter. In the event that is impossible we will work with you to arrange a refund through other channels.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed. Not responsible for changes in the rate of foreign exchange.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By pledging to this project, you agree to conduct all public interactions via Kickstarter's communications channels with this project and our team and other backers in a positive manner. Harassment, name-calling, or attempts to inject inappropriate content into the public communications channels for the project will result in the cancellation of your pledge (with a full refund) and your ejection from the campaign. We want the communications channels for this campaign to be a friendly, positive place for our community to gather and discuss the campaign, ask questions, and provide input.

AEG reserves the right to cancel any pledge (with a full refund) at any time, for any reason. If your pledge is cancelled while the campaign is ongoing you agree not to re-pledge either under your original account or under any other account you control. Violations of this policy will be reported to Kickstarter.

Minor cosmetic damage to the box or other packaging can occur during shipping. AEG makes reasonable efforts to ensure that the shipping containers it uses are suitable for the safe delivery of the Rewards. If you believe that your Reward has suffered more than minor cosmetic damage please contact us immediately. Keep all packaging including outer cartons for our inspection. AEG will at its sole discretion determine if the damage constitutes other than minor cosmetic damage and/or was the result of insufficient packaging.

If we ship to the address that you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is returned to us as undeliverable you will pay the full cost to ship the Reward again to a revised address.

If we ship the Reward to the address you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is delivered to that address but you are unable to receive it, or you have moved and are no longer the occupant of that address and cannot otherwise retrieve the package, or if the package is lost or stolen after delivery, and you wish to have the order fulfilled again you will pay the full cost to ship the order to a revised address plus the amount of the original Reward plus Add-Ons and other upgrades on your order.

In all cases you acknowledge that quantities are limited and AEG may not be able to ship all or part of your order more than once.

If any part of your order cannot be fulfilled for any reason AEG will provide you with a pro-rated refund for that portion of your order.

By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.

If you do not log in to our Pledge Manager and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your Reward if you contact us and confirm your pledge after the 8 week window has elapsed.

If you confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our Pledge Manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the general release.

If you have questions or concerns about these terms & conditions please email kickstarter@alderac.com for further information.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Information about 1st & 2nd Generation Premium Sleeve Availability for Backers
updates.update_content:
Greeting Backer!
This is a very quick update to let you know that we are ready to move forward with the plan to start addressing the issue of mismatched Premium Sleeve sizes. We have just sent an email to all backers of this campaign who ordered sleeves. If you did not receive that email please contact kickstarter@alderac.com and we'll be happy to get you the needed info.
A small quantity of 1st generation sleeves will be available on Monday, July 13th at 9am (Pacific) to backers of this Kickstarter who ordered sleeves. We expect that the 1st generation sleeves we have on hand will be claimed the same day so if you want to get more 1st generation sleeves be sure you read the email and are prepared to act as soon as possible after 9am (Pacific) on Monday July 13th.

Friends,  
We are pleased to announce that Thunderstone Quest is returning to Kickstarter today June 17th at 9am (Pacific). This is the third Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest. We’ve developed an incredible community of backers here on Kickstarter for Thunderstone and we’re very pleased to bring the next two Quests to that community today!  
In this campaign you can get the original Champion Reward featuring 5 Quests (1 Kickstarter Exclusive!), the To the Barricades! component that has two more Quests plus the Barricades Mode system for solo & co-op play, and you can back the all-new content New Horizons featuring two more Quests and the Ezuzuris’ Lair promo pack for Barricades Mode!

Thunderstone Quest: Back to the Dungeon has nearly completed delivery and we are pleased to announce that we're returning to Kickstarter in just a few weeks with the next campaign for Mike Elliott's deckbuilding game of heroic adventure!

Dear Backers,
Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon is being fulfilled now and many of you have already received your Rewards!
We've had some questions about the contents. When you get your To the Barricades! component you'll be receiving a very large box - the same size as the Champion Reward!

updates.update_userinfo: Australia, New Zealand and Asia we have good news!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
Those of you who were a part of our first Adventure from Thunderstone Keep may remember that we experienced some unexpected delays delivering the Rewards from the 1st Thunderstone Kickstarter to our Champions in Australia and New Zealand.
We really didn't want a repeat of that experience this time, so we've worked with our logistics team to ensure that the Rewards would arrive at the Depot in Australia a little earlier than necessary for processing. And they did such a good job that we've been cleared to begin delivery to our Australia and New Zealand backers immediately!

updates.update_userinfo: Updated information on Reward & Late Pledge Delivery - now scheduled for May
updates.update_content:
Backers we've received confirmation from our team in China that your Rewards have finished manufacturing and packout and are on the water headed to their Depots. We are currently running about three weeks behind schedule and now expect to deliver Rewards and Late Pledges in the third week of May.
We apologize for these delays and we're going to work with our manufacturing facilities and our production & logistics team to determine if there is any corrective action we can take on future productions to reduce or remove this kind of delay. We appreciate your patience.

updates.update_userinfo: Expedited Champion delayed shipments are being processed today.
updates.update_content:
Backers, if you had one of the 1,000 Expedited Champion + Barricades Rewards and you were previously notified that your Reward was delayed, we have news.

Our warehouse has begun shipping Champion units to the Backers we are able to honor the Expedited Reward for. 79 Backers with delayed Expedited Champion units are being shipped right now. As soon as we receive the list of tracking numbers from the warehouse we'll be emailing those Backers to communicate that information.

The 41 Backers we are not able to honor with their Expedited shipment have been emailed and offered options for resolution of the problem. They can reply to that email immediately and we'll begin processing their requests.

If you believe you had an Expedited order and you have not been contacted via email, log in to your order on Crowdox and review the Reward you selected. If it does not say "Expedited" then your Reward is not Expedited and you are not affected by this issue. Please note that a small number of backers who selected Expedited Rewards in the Kickstarter changed those Rewards when they completed their orders on Crowdox; if your order doesn't say it's "Expedited" in the reward title, it's no longer Expedited.

If you have any questions or concerns about the delayed Expedited Champion shipments, please email kickstarter@alderac.com.

-- The AEG Thunderstone Team

campaign.story:
Eclipse Second Dawn for the Galaxy is the updated core game of the space opera masterpiece from designer Touko Tahkokallio and publisher Lautapelit.fi. 
Eclipse is a "4X" game where players will command a human or alien species that explores, expands, exploits, and exterminates their way to victory. Over 8 rounds, each player will select actions to achieve their goals, carefully managing resources, engaging in epic battles with one another and the Ancients that lie in wait. Only one will guide the galaxy toward the second dawn.
This new edition features new components and thoughtfully revised content, incorporating material from former expansions to create the best possible updated version of the game. For more information about these revisions, click here.
 Review the draft rulebook here. 
Human Ship Scale for Reference
         For a comprehensive look at the revisions, please click THIS LINK.
*Art not final - Subject to Change
Please click on your desired reward level to see the shipping cost for your region. Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping is very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a small discount on ALL shipping, but no shipping is free.
This campaign includes Customs-Friendly delivery to the US, Canada, the UK, and the EU. Customs-Friendly means, if you live in any of these regions and have any additional charges for receiving your package, simply email kickstarter@kolossalgames.com a copy of your customs receipt and we will reimburse you via PayPal. Note: If your country is not in one of the above-mentioned regions, we cannot guarantee customs friendly shipping in these areas. (For example, Norway & Switzerland are not in the European Union.)
We have adjusted rates for the following countries: Macao, Australia, China, Israel, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Norway, New Zealand, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, Switzerland, Thailand, Turkey, Taiwan, Ukraine, Vietnam, and Hong Kong. If you live in one of these countries, please choose the desired pledge level with the title "adjusted shipping" included. 
Please note: While the U.S. is customs-friendly, there is a small possibility that tariffs for the U.S. are something that could happen in the future. This would be new for the U.S. and if it does come up we will address the impact in an update.
Click to Download
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While Eclipse is our sixth Kickstarter project from Kolossal Games, our team has years of experience with publishing games. We have an impeccable track record of successfully delivering previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters in a timely fashion--if not sooner. Our commitment to building a strong, supportive community around Kolossal Games will enable us to also deliver this project on time and with the highest quality possible.

That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. There are many steps in the process of manufacturing and fulfilling a game, many of which involve partnerships. Through careful and thorough planning, common mistakes can be avoided. However, possible delays can occur from circumstances beyond our immediate control. If such an issue is encountered, our team will adapt and no corners will be cut to course correct as needed.

Our greatest obstacle is simply the funding capital to manufacture such an ambitious product of the highest quality capable. Your contribution makes this a reality!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Miss the campaign? It's probably too late to buy!
When Cutie Met Patootie is a Kickstarter Exclusive Game. That means the only copies of this game are available via Kickstarter. In 2019, I will launch Game Two of the Entanglement Series, Children of the Wildlight. When Cutie Met Patootie may be available in that campaign as an add-on, but that decision has not been finalized. Stay tuned for more announcements by subscribing to The Daniel Zayas Company newsletter! Every new subscriber adds $1 to the money headed to The Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund International from me in December!
Test the game for FREE on Tabletopia!
                                     Special thanks to The Dice Tower for including When Cutie Met Patootie in the FOMO segment! 
Derek and Lizzy from Board Game Spotlight played a 2-player version of the game!
 Doug Shute from Victory Condition Gaming had me on for an interview!
Jambalaya Plays Games stopped to talk with me about the game at Origins!
Check out a mention of When Cutie Met Patootie on the June Hype Train Podcast from Board Game Closet below!
You can read the full preview from Rob Kalajian on his blog, A Pawn's Perspective. Also, check out his solo play video below!
In Chapter One, we learn of the Visitors, and how they arrived on Earth. What dangers await?
In Chapter Two, we learn of the Citizens of Kodiak Harbor and how Cutie gets mixed up in this adventure!
In Chapter Three, we learn of the evil mage, Rewind, and his ability to corrupt our mysterious glowing face to his bidding! What dangers await us in the final chapter?
 In Chapter Four, our heroes have made their way almost to the top of the mountain, but watch out! Rewind has caught up with them! What dangers will befall our heroes in the final chapter of When Cutie Met Patootie?
Shipping is super simple on this campaign. US is FREE, EU/UK is $8, CA and Mexico is $9, AU/NZ is $10, and affordable rates everywhere else! If you prefer to avoid the shipping entirely, have your approved Friendly Local Game Shop pledge for the retail bulk buy option!
THERE WILL BE NO LATE PLEDGES AVAILABLE FOR THIS GAME OR THROUGH REGULAR DISTRIBUTION. YOU MUST PLEDGE FOR A COPY HERE IN THE CAMPAIGN.
Please note that some shipping rates to high-risk countries have an added cost reflected in their shipping.
Retailers: I'd love for you to carry my game in your store! Click here for more info.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This will be my first published game under The Daniel Zayas Company banner, but it is far from my first experience on the Kickstarter platform or the board game industry. I have officially collaborated on multiple campaigns as a verified Kickstarter Expert for more than a year, and before that, I helped launch 10 campaigns for Eagle-Gryphon Games as their Marketing Director. I also currently work as the US Sales Manager for LongPack Games Manufacturing.

When Cutie Met Patootie is 95% complete. After the campaign's successful completion, I will have the artist get to work on the Citizens of Kodiak Harbor promo cards as well as do a couple UX touchups on the graphic design of the cards. The quotes are in from LongPack Games on production, and I have multiple quotes in place for fulfillment to backers. There really isn't much left to do on the creative side to get this in your hands. It will be mostly logistics from here on out.

As a backer, please expect monthly updates until the campaign fully fulfills. Delays are part of the process, but I have built in enough lead time that I am confident we will ship the games on time or beforehand. I consider you the backer as an integral part of this project for your investment and confidence in me. I want to be as transparent as possible with you through every step of the adventure.

Thanks for your support and I am excited to bring When Cutie Met Patootie to your table!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
As you all have started to receive the games, I wanted to clear up the content in the back referring to future games. This game rulebook was finalized with artwork and pages etc. quite some time ago. While I have plans and ideas for all of those games, it is not totally accurate at this time that the people who started the games with me will continue development on those games. Keep an eye out for the titles, but also know I am trying to fulfill Tangled Timelines before asking for more money from the KS community.
Be well and I hope you enjoy When Cutie Met Patootie. A lot of love went into this first publishing of mine.

Hello, backers! Here are the latest updates for the fulfillment of When Cutie Met Patootie.
I have received today the confirmation that the games have left the fulfillment center. They had to reprint the shipping labels for some reason, which caused a small delay. They have been very upfront and communicative lately, so that is a good sign.
The facility has also assured me that you should receive a shipping notice via email at some point soon. Check your spam before claiming you didn't get one. (Chinese email servers bounce a lot).
If you sent me via PM any updates to your addresses as of 2 weeks ago, that was accepted by the fulfillment center and they should be headed to the correct place. I cannot update addresses anymore, unfortunately.
I intentionally shipped the game with extra gems so as to avoid costly replacement shipping. Please play with the correct number as depicted in the rulebook (20 per color gem).

Thank you all for your patience while I navigated the fulfillment process I selected for When Cutie Met Patootie. It was a risk to try an experiment and it really took a lot longer to communicate back and forth with the provider than I thought was possible. However, I have great news. 
Per the fulfillment house, these games will ship this coming week and should arrive   to your homes 2-3 weeks after they ship. This was the big reveal I was hoping for and it actually paid off. Success!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update! Headed out of the factory!
updates.update_content: Just got this photo from LongPack late last night.

Hey, friends! 
I have certainly overestimated my ability to stay on schedule with you while also doing my regular work through LongPack Games. Truth be told, I have spent a total of about three weeks home this entire Summer while convention season demanded most of my attention. I traveled all over, from China to Gen Con to Origins to Orlando to Minneapolis to all sorts of other great cities meeting with factories and clients and business collaborators. It has certainly been a whirlwind which has unfortunately pulled me away from regular updates here.

updates.update_userinfo: June Update: Closing Down the Surveys!
May Update: Mass Manufacturing is Already Underway!
updates.update_content:
Factory News
I got word from my teammates at LongPack Games that we are currently mass manufacturing When Cutie Met Patootie! I received the samples last month and made a few requested changes based on that, and we got that sorted. Now we are on the home stretch!

updates.update_userinfo: April Update - Print the Game Today!
updates.update_content:
Hello, friends!
The Print n Play is ready!
A backer asked me if I would send it out soon, and I replied that I would likely send it out next month. But it's ready, so I thought... why wait?!

Apologies for missing last month. I would be the first to chide a fellow creator for abandoning good communication with backers, but all things are moving forward. We had a slight delay in figuring out how to best make the collectors box and those of you receiving one are really in for a treat. We are doing something I don't think has been widely replicated but is a genius engineering solution. I have Dan from Tectonic Craft Studios to thank for his incredible design skills. I highly recommend you use them for your custom project needs. But just what am I talking about? Well, I had Dan send me a prototype of what we have been working on. Please note the prototype is MDF but the final product will be a much nicer looking material.

updates.update_userinfo: January Update: No News is Good News!
updates.update_content:
This is more of a "I promised to update you once per month" more so than having any real progress updates for this game. Everything is going well with this project, and the latest DZC game is actually doing really well as well.  You can check out Tangled Timelines here.
All the files are with LongPack. We decided to postpone production until after Chinese New Year rather than make the games and have them sit in the warehouse until the shippers get back to work after the holidays.
